SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class ResourceCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.ResourceCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldResourceCard, StartingCard
public class ResourceCard extends Card
The ResourceCard is a child class of Cards; it defines the resource cards, which are placeable objects during the game. A resource card has its own type and has visible resources in the four edges; it can be placed with the front or back face visible. Once positioned, the card will appear in the grid on the player private board with its specific coordinates.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(int cardID, CardElements cardElement, List<CardElements> frontEdgeResources)
      Constructor method for ResourceCard, which creates and initializes the attributes for a new resource card. The parameters which are not taken in input are set on default value. Another constructor uses overloading to set card points too. This constructor is usually used by the card loader from JSON file
      Parameters:
      cardID - Identification number of the card
      cardElement - Element of the card
      frontEdgeResources - List of the front edges element ((1) top-left, (2) top-right, (3) bottom-left, (4) bottom-right)

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(int cardID, CardElements cardElement, List<CardElements> frontEdgeResources, int scorePoints)
      Constructor method for ResourceCard, which create and initializes the attributes for a new resource card. The parameters which are not taken in input are set on default value. This constructor takes also the score points attribute. This constructor is usually used by the card loader from JSON file
      Parameters:
      cardID - Identification number of the card
      cardElement - Element of the card
      frontEdgeResources - List of the front edges element ((1) top-left, (2) top-right, (3) bottom-left, (4) bottom-right)
      scorePoints - Points (normal score type) of the card

    • countCardElements

      public Map<CardElements,Integer> countCardElements()
      This method analyses the card edges and return a map with the couples "resource type" - "number of apparitions". It is used by the private board and by the player to know how many resources he has
      Returns:
      The map of the resources in the edges of a card

    • calculateScore

      public int calculateScore(Map<CardElements,Integer> elementsCounter)
      This method serves as a mean to increase Player's score after a Card is placed
      Parameters:
      elementsCounter - is the Map of every element on a Player's PrivateBoard's cardGrid
      Returns:
      the amount of points given by a card to increase the score

    • isPlaceableAccordingRequests

      public boolean isPlaceableAccordingRequests(Map<CardElements,Integer> elementsCounter)
      This method checks if a card can be placed
      Parameters:
      elementsCounter - Map of the actual elements of the player
      Returns:
      true because a ResourceCard can always be placed

    • activationOnGrid

      public void activationOnGrid(CardFace cardFace)
      This method sets up the card when it's placed in the cardGrid. For a Resource Card and a GoldResourceCard, in case they are placed with CardFace == BACK this method resets all the edges to FREE
      Parameters:
      cardFace - is the orientation of the Card placed
